```javascript
const ingredientsArray = ["cheese", "dough", "sauce", "pepperoni"]
const ingredientsString = 'cheese, dough, sauce, pepperoni'
const ingredientsObject = {
  ingredients: ["cheese", "dough", "sauce", "pepperoni"]
}

console.log(Array.isArray(ingredientsArray)) // true
console.log(Array.isArray(ingredientsString)) // false
console.log(Array.isArray(ingredientsObject)) // false
// also works for arrays inside of objects:
console.log(Array.isArray(ingredientsObject.ingredients)) // true 
```
title: Check if a value is an array
